div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/OrganizationAffiliation|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `OrganizationAffiliation` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `OrganizationAffiliation`. Element `OrganizationAffiliation` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.contained`, but has no comparisons.

Element `OrganizationAffiliation.active` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.active`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.period` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.period`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.organization` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.organization`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.participatingOrganization` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.participatingOrganization`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.network` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.network`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.code`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.specialty` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.specialty`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.location` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.location`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.healthcareService` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.healthcareService`, but has no comparisons.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.contact` has a context of OrganizationAffiliation based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `OrganizationAffiliation`.
Element `OrganizationAffiliation.endpoint` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `OrganizationAffiliation.endpoint`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
